original: 曹軍糾集萬名弓弩手，盡皆向江中放箭，箭如雨發。待日高霧散，諸葛亮下令收船急回。二十艘船上的束草，皆已排滿箭矢。
text: Cao Jun gathered tens of thousands of crossbowmen and bowers, and they all threw arrows into the river like rain. When the fog cleared at the high altitude, Zhuge Liang ordered the ship to take back and return. Sokcho on the twenty boats is full of arrows.
